entries.name: activated
entries.desc: The specification that was activated prior to the conflict

entries.name: dependency
entries.desc: The dependency that is in conflict with the activated gem.

entries.name: new(dependency, activated, failed_dep=dependency)
entries.desc: Creates a new resolver conflict when dependency is in conflict with an already activated specification.

entries.name: conflicting_dependencies()
entries.desc: Return the 2 dependency objects that conflicted

entries.name: explain()
entries.desc: A string explanation of the conflict.

entries.name: explanation()
entries.desc: Explanation of the conflict used by exceptions to print useful messages

entries.name: for_spec?(spec)
entries.desc: Returns true if the conflicting dependency's name matches spec.

entries.name: request_path(current)
entries.desc: Path of activations from the current list.

entries.name: requester()
entries.desc: Return the Specification that listed the dependency
